patthana17.26:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.26:0.3_0: should apply themselves to skillful qualities.
patthana17.26:1.1_0: Meditate spreading in rapture and bliss born of rapture.
patthana17.26:2.1_0: Pleasant is a cause of pleasure and pain to arise in the seven ways.
patthana17.26:4.1_0: They surpass the other refuge for one hundred and twenty-four feelings. ...
